paperback-writer.outputTypes.dsc: Output formats: PDF, HTML, PNG, JPEG. Multiple output formats are supported.
paperback-writer.autoOutput.dsc: Enable Auto export on save. To apply the settings, you need to restart Visual Studio Code
paperback-writer.listOfFileNamesExcluded: Excluded file name of exportOnSave option
paperback-writer.outputDirectory.dsc: Specify the directory to export to. If left empty, the file will be exported to the same location as the source file.
paperback-writer.outputDirectoryRelative: If set, the relative path specified in the export directory will be interpreted as relative to the location of that file.
paperback-writer.customCSS: List of paths for custom stylesheets (CSS) to be used.
paperback-writer.customCSSRelativePathFi: If set, incorporate the paths to the CSS files specified in custom styles as is (without converting to relative paths).
extension.paperback-writer.all: Output Markdown to HTML, PDF, PNG, JPEG
paperback-writer.pdfHeaderHtmlElementTem: pdf only. HTML template for the print header.
paperback-writer.pdfFooterHtmlElementTem: pdf only. HTML template for the print footer.
paperback-writer.pdfPaperSizeFormat.dsc: Paper size (pdf only), invalid if paper width or height is set.
paperback-writer.width.dsc: Paper width (pdf only), mm, cm, in, px units are available. If set, `Pdf Paper Size Format` will be disabled.
paperback-writer.height.dsc: Paper height (pdf only), mm, cm, in, px units are available. If set, `Pdf Paper Size Format` will be disabled.
paperback-writer.margin.top.dsc: Page Option. Border Top. units: mm, cm, in, px
paperback-writer.margin.bottom.dsc: Page Option. Border Bottom. units: mm, cm, in, px
paperback-writer.margin.right.dsc: Page Option. Border Right. units: mm, cm, in, px
paperback-writer.margin.left.dsc: Page Option. Border Left. units: mm, cm, in, px
paperback-writer.clip.x.dsc: png and jpeg only. x-coordinate of top-left corner of clip area.
paperback-writer.clip.y.dsc: png and jpeg only. y-coordinate of top-left corner of clip area.
paperback-writer.clip.width.dsc: png and jpeg only. Width of clip area.
paperback-writer.clip.height.dsc: png and jpeg only. Height of clip area.
markdown-pdf.outputDirector.notExist: The output directory specified by the outputDirectory option does not exist.
paperback-writer.pathToAnExternalChromiu: Path to a Chromium or Chrome executable to run instead of the bundled Chromium.
